title: Rooftop Bars: What are the best hotels in New York with rooftop bars
excerpt: Finding hotels in New York with rooftop bars can be a daunting task, as the city is filled with options that often overlook this luxurious feature. This curated list highlights the best hotels that not only offer stunning views but also create an unforgettable atmosphere for relaxation and socializing. Discovering these gems can elevate your stay, providing the perfect backdrop for memorable moments in the city that never sleeps.
intro: Explore the ultimate guide to the best hotels in New York that feature breathtaking rooftop bars, perfect for unwinding and soaking in the skyline.

hotels.name: The Knickerbocker
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant energy of Times Square at The Knickerbocker, featuring a stunning rooftop terrace where you can sip cocktails at St.Cloud while enjoying breathtaking city skyline views. Each luxurious room offers modern amenities, including a flat-screen TV and plush bathrobes, ensuring your comfort during your stay. Located just steps from Bryant Park and the New York Public Library, this hotel also boasts exceptional dining options, making it the perfect base for an unforgettable New York City adventure.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a stunning rooftop bar, St.Cloud, offering breathtaking skyline views and exceptional dining options in Times Square.

hotels.description: Nestled in the lively NoMad neighborhood, Hotel Giraffe by Library Hotel Collection combines luxury with a nostalgic flair, featuring rooms decorated with stunning 1920s and 1930s photography. With its prime location near Union Square Park and convenient transportation options, this hotel is ideal for an unforgettable New York City getaway.
